alert.note: Alert for Madison; Prince William; Rappahannock (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 8:02AM EST until December 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of northern Virginia and northwest Virginia, including the following counties: in northern Virginia, City of Fairfax, City of Manassas, City of Manassas Park, Culpeper, Fairfax, Fauquier, Loudoun and Prince William. In northwest Virginia, Madison and Rappahannock. * WHEN...Until 130 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 802 AM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Centreville... Dale City... Reston... Leesburg... Annandale... Springfield... South Riding... Herndon... Fairfax... Culpeper... Vienna... Broadlands... Lansdowne... Lowes Island... Brambleton... Warrenton... Mantua... Pimmit Hills... Madison... Dulles International Airport... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
